name: Art museum gallery demo
description:
(No installation needed: just download and execute the .exe file)

A simple immersive demo, made during spare time, to demonstrate how an interactive art gallery could be.

Game controls:

A, W, S, D = move around.
Mouse movement = look around.
Left Shift = run.
Left Ctrl = crouch.
Up arrow = increase music volume.
Down arrow = decrease music volume.
1, 2 = floor materials switch.

E = when near an Art Piece, you will enter into the 'inspector' mode. Press again to go back to 'walking' mode.
Mouse wheel = (when observing a any Art) zoom.
Left mouse click = (when observing a Painting) drag & pan.
Left mouse click = (when observing the Statue) orbit around a pivot point.
Right mouse click = (when observing the Statue) set the new center-orbit pivot.

Esc = exit & close.

I hope you like it! All comments are welcome.
